attributes.action: Put an end to the forcing upon the British public of the Sexual Orientation Regulations and reinstate Clause 28
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Homosexuality is a choice of lifestyle. Everyone has the right to accept or reject it without being forced to condone it by the state (or Brussels)
It should not be taught as a viable alternative to the most vulnerable - schoolchildren. This could only happen in a Marxist state.

rejection.details: There are already petitions on this topic: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=Sexual+Orientation+Regulations
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
